title: TS Lint plugin contributions to package.json

enableDiagnostics.description: Enable diagnostics by parsing SQL statements and validating types using the specified schema file.

schemaFile.description: Path to JSON file describing the types used in youe database schema. See https://github.com/frigus02/typescript-sql-tagged-template-plugin for more information.

defaultSchemaName.description: Databse schema name used when SQL statements don't specify a schema.

enableFormat.description: Enable formatting support for SQL in tagged template literals using pgFormatter. Requires Perl.
